players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.

Diana: "
I am innocent and need your help to find the mafia.
"
You: "I am the detective and have identified Charlie as the mafioso. I will support you, Diana, in finding him."
Diana: "I am innocent and will work with Alice to uncover the mafia. Let's gather more information tonight."
